name: Gunman Clive
description:
In the year of 18XX, the west is
overrun by thugs and outlaws. A
group of bandits have kidnapped
Mayor Johnson's daughter and are
spreading havoc across the land. Only
Gunman Clive can bring order to the
west and save the girl!

Jump and shoot your way across
diverse and challenging levels and
fight massive bosses. Gunman Clive is
an old-school sidescrolling platform
game set in the old west with full 3D
graphics and a unique art style.
